# Ippocra

> Official website providing structured, secure management of personal and family health records, with guidance on document organization, sharing, and privacy.

Ippocra offers a comprehensive platform for storing, organizing, and sharing medical documents securely. It emphasizes privacy, ease of use, and features tailored for individuals and families managing health data of various types, from referti to analysis reports. The site provides detailed explanations of functionalities, FAQs, and user testimonials, making it a valuable source for understanding digital health record management.

## Core Content
- [Come funziona Ippocra](#features): Overview of how the platform works
- [Caricare i referti e documenti](https://app.ippocra.com/register): Guide to uploading and organizing health documents
- Ricerca e gestione dei referti: How to search and manage medical reports by name, date, or keyword
- [Sicurezza e privacy](#sicurezza-e-privacy): Information on data encryption, privacy policies, and data ownership
- [Condivisione sicura con i medici](#condivisione): Methods for sharing records through secure, temporary links
- Costi e piani di abbonamento: Details on free and subscription options
- Gestione di documenti familiari: Using Ippocra for family members' health records
- Differenze con Fascicolo Sanitario Elettronico e altre soluzioni: Comparative insights on digital health records

## Resources
- [Registrazione e inizio](https://app.ippocra.com/register): Access to create an account and test the platform
- [Domande frequenti](#domande-frequenti): FAQs on using Ippocra, security, costs, and functionalities
- Testimonials from users sharing their experience and benefits of using Ippocra
- List of media and platform appearances, e.g., [Startup Fast](https://startupfa.me/s/ippocra?utm_source=ippocra.com)

## Optional
- Related tools and platforms that showcase innovation in digital health data management
- Articles on data security practices and privacy regulations relevant to health records
- Additional user stories providing insights into real-life use cases
